title: The Greatest Surah and Ayah
transcript:
it is the best Ayah in the entire Quran the best   Ayah yes this is what the prophet (Peace and 
Blessings Upon him) told us which indicates   that the verses of the Quran vary in their 
importance the greatest of them all is   Ayatul Kursi so what's the greatest of all 
chapters of the Quran is suratul Fatiha
